md:
giải nghĩa từ "companies" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan

**Definition:** A company is a business organization that makes, buys, or sells goods or services.

**Vietnamese translation:** Công ty

**Part of speech:** Noun

**Example sentence:** The company will launch a new product next month.

**Related words:**

* Corporation (tập đoàn)
* Enterprise (doanh nghiệp)
* Firm (công ty)
* Business (kinh doanh)
* Industry (ngành công nghiệp)

Note: The word "company" can also refer to a group of people who work together, such as a theater company or a dance company. In this case, the Vietnamese translation would be "đoàn" or "nhóm".
html:

Definition: A company is a business organization that makes, buys, or sells goods or services.

Vietnamese translation: Công ty

Part of speech: Noun

Example sentence: The company will launch a new product next month.

Related words:

  • Corporation (tập đoàn)
  • Enterprise (doanh nghiệp)
  • Firm (công ty)
  • Business (kinh doanh)
  • Industry (ngành công nghiệp)

Note: The word "company" can also refer to a group of people who work together, such as a theater company or a dance company. In this case, the Vietnamese translation would be "đoàn" or "nhóm".
